Greetings
    its very urgent - please HELP

    My name Vladimir from Ukraine im 32yrs old have wife and 3yrs old child

    Due to revolution issues - i was in local Maydan and posted some comments in social networks - and now people chasing me and my family - and thretening me!

    Please help me and my family - i can be injured or even killed- they are scarry people.
    I have money, also I use to live in UK for 5 year - i have alot of friends there (British friends) who can give recomendation
    i speak very good English - i can find job in UK withing 1 day/

    i can guaranty that i will not ask any money from government/
    my father is brain surgeon and we have money/

    Please help us to leave this scarry country Ukraine and rellocate to UK/

    Best Regards vladzabyelin@yahoo.co.uk +380993097117
